alert.note: Alert for Missoula, Bitterroot Valleys (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 07 at 10:58AM MST until January 08 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 5 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy mixed precipitation. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of one tenth of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph this afternoon. For the Winter Weather Advisory, Rain or mixed precipitation will change to snow showers late this evening into the overnight. Total snow accumulations from 1 to 4 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph with snow showers. * WHERE...Missoula/Bitterroot Valleys. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, until 2 PM MST this afternoon. For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 2 PM this afternoon to 5 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be affected.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
